title: Four more days
creator_contributor_role: University of New South Wales. Tertiary Education Research Centre, production company

description: Experimental study of three different prison environments. The central question raised is: ''What sorts of changes are required in prisons in order to produce a system of human relationships consistent with a correctional rather than a custodial orientation?"
